name: Prana Stretch Zion Convertible Pants - Men's
description: Designed for the situational adventures that hiking and travel typically bring. Gusseted crotch permits mobility, whether you’re scrambling over fallen logs or sprinting for the last ferry. An adjustable waistband will help you relax after a plate full of beans and tortillas or seventeen courses of tapas.Made of nylon and spandex, an abrasion-resistant, quick-drying fabric with easy stretch.Fabric is treated with DWR to resist light rain.Front and rear pockets, and angled dual entry cargo pockets.Belt loops at waistband.Zip-off legs to convert to shorts (30.5cm/12" inseam).
